I found these two contracts that have a interesting requirement. Is this a bug? And if it is not than how suppose to complete it?

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I think it wants you to build a station with an asteroid as the core module.
..Use clamps to attach the station to an asteroid..?
pretty sure its's not a bug. I've seen people make space stations using asteroids and the clamps.
It's not a bug, you do actually have to make an asteroid base, you better start practising your asteroid rendezvous

It's not a bug, you do actually have to make an asteroid base, you better start practising your asteroid rendezvous

If we look at that though. it wants you to lug the thing out to Duna or Jool. Its not like wrangling a D class is hard enough but to then ship that out to Jool? Is this on Hard mode or no? If its not than that is in fact ridiculous. Matter of fact a lot of the contracts are ridiculous as far as difficulty and it has good potential to hurt new player retention, not that this game doesn't have enough trouble with that.
Not a bug. Build a station, and use a "grabber" to attach to an asteroid. Push the asteroid to the specified orbit, and you will complete the contract.

Is this on Hard mode or no?

If this was hard mode, you wouldn't even get a cool 2 million for doing it; you'd get like 400k

The difficulty part I guess is fair though. I have no idea how I'm going to shift a class B to solar escape velocity (one of my contracts), but I fully expect it'll be a blast
